mapper.sql: ID, CASE_ID, REQUEST_ID, ISSUE_TYPE, ISSUE_ID, ISSUS_TIME, CREATE_TIME, DOC_ID, SECRETARY_ID, ARBITRATOR_ID, SAVE_A_DRAFT

mapper.insert: insert into case_doc_content (ID, CASE_ID, REQUEST_ID, ISSUE_TYPE, ISSUE_ID, ISSUS_TIME, CREATE_TIME, DOC_ID, SECRETARY_ID, ARBITRATOR_ID, SAVE_A_DRAFT, BODY_TEXT, OPINION, FINAL_DECISION) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{issueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issusTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secretaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arbitratorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveADraft,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bodyText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{opinion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{finalDecision,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

ID,
CASE_ID,
REQUEST_ID,
ISSUE_TYPE,

CREATE_TIME,
DOC_ID,
SECRETARY_ID,
ARBITRATOR_ID,
SAVE_A_DRAFT,
BODY_TEXT,
OPINION,
FINAL_DECISION,

mapper.update:
update case_doc_content
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_ID = #{record.requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSUE_TYPE = #{record.issueType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ISSUE_ID = #{record.issueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSUS_TIME = #{record.issusTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DOC_ID = #{record.docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECRETARY_ID = #{record.secretaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARBITRATOR_ID = #{record.arbitratorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAVE_A_DRAFT = #{record.saveADraft,jdbcType=CHAR},
BODY_TEXT = #{record.bodyText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
OPINION = #{record.opinion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
FINAL_DECISION = #{record.finalDecision,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update case_doc_content set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_ID = #{record.requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUE_TYPE = #{record.issueType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ISSUE_ID = #{record.issueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUS_TIME = #{record.issusTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DOC_ID = #{record.docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECRETARY_ID = #{record.secretaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARBITRATOR_ID = #{record.arbitratorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAVE_A_DRAFT = #{record.saveADraft,jdbcType=CHAR}, BODY_TEXT = #{record.bodyText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, OPINION = #{record.opinion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FINAL_DECISION = #{record.finalDecision,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update case_doc_content set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_ID = #{record.requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUE_TYPE = #{record.issueType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ISSUE_ID = #{record.issueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUS_TIME = #{record.issusTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DOC_ID = #{record.docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECRETARY_ID = #{record.secretaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARBITRATOR_ID = #{record.arbitratorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAVE_A_DRAFT = #{record.saveADraft,jdbcType=CHAR}

update case_doc_content
CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSUE_TYPE = #{issueType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ISSUE_ID = #{issueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSUS_TIME = #{issusTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DOC_ID = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECRETARY_ID = #{secretaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARBITRATOR_ID = #{arbitratorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAVE_A_DRAFT = #{saveADraft,jdbcType=CHAR},
BODY_TEXT = #{bodyText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
OPINION = #{opinion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
FINAL_DECISION = #{finalDecision,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update case_doc_content set CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUE_TYPE = #{issueType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ISSUE_ID = #{issueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUS_TIME = #{issusTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DOC_ID = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECRETARY_ID = #{secretaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARBITRATOR_ID = #{arbitratorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAVE_A_DRAFT = #{saveADraft,jdbcType=CHAR}, BODY_TEXT = #{bodyText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, OPINION = #{opinion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FINAL_DECISION = #{finalDecision,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update case_doc_content set CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUE_TYPE = #{issueType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ISSUE_ID = #{issueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUS_TIME = #{issusTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DOC_ID = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECRETARY_ID = #{secretaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARBITRATOR_ID = #{arbitratorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAVE_A_DRAFT = #{saveADraft,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE case_doc_content
body_text = #{bodyText},
opinion = #{opinion},
final_decision = #{finalDecision},
issue_type = #{issueType},
WHERE doc_id=#{docId}
mapper.select: SELECT cd.id FROM case_doc cd LEFT JOIN case_approve ca ON ca.busi_id = cd.busi_id WHERE cd.status = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseDocStatusEnum@NORMAL.getCode()} AND ca.approve_status != ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseApproveStatusEnum@SUCCESS_AUDIT.getValue()} AND ca.approve_type = #{approveType} AND ca.case_id = #{caseId}

SELECT cd.doc_year_number docYearNo, cd.doc_serial_number docSerialNo, cdc.arbitrator_id arbitratorId, cdc.secretary_id arbitrationSecretaryId, cdc.body_text bodyText, cdc.final_decision finalDecision FROM case_doc cd LEFT JOIN case_doc_content cdc ON cd.id = cdc.doc_id WHERE cd.case_id =#{caseId} AND cd.status = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseDocStatusEnum@NORMAL.getCode()} AND cd.doc_type = #{docType}

SELECT
,
FROM case_doc_content WHERE doc_id = ( SELECT ID FROM case_doc WHERE case_id = #{caseId} AND doc_type = #{docType} )

SELECT CASE cdc.issue_type WHEN 0 THEN '0' ELSE '1' END FROM case_doc_content cdc LEFT JOIN case_doc cd ON cd.id = cdc.doc_id WHERE cdc.status = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseDocStatusEnum@NORMAL.getCode()} AND cdc.busi_id = #{busiId}

SELECT ca.busi_id FROM case_approve ca LEFT JOIN case_doc cd ON ca.busi_id = cd.busi_id LEFT JOIN case_doc_content cdc ON cdc.doc_id = cd.id WHERE ca.approve_type = #{approveType} AND ca.case_id = #{caseId} AND cd.status = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseDocStatusEnum@NORMAL.getCode()} AND cdc.issue_type = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseDocContentIssueTypeEnum@AGREE_MODULE.getCode()}
